Barycentrics    73*a^4-47*(b^2-c^2)^2-26*a^2*(b^2+c^2)

Y(13540) lies on these lines: {2, 3}, {4678, 28202}, {5032, 51029}, {10248, 50874}, {11645, 51213}, {12820, 41943}, {12821, 41944}, {14927, 51026}, {19053, 42642}, {19054, 42641}, {20054, 41869}, {20070, 50862}, {20583, 51538}, {21356, 51167}, {41951, 43800}, {41952, 43799}, {42087, 43477}, {42088, 43478}, {42099, 43024}, {42100, 43025}, {42160, 43253}, {42161, 43252}, {42510, 43547}, {42511, 43546}, {42537, 43512}, {42538, 43511}, {42635, 49825}, {42636, 49824}, {43195, 43403}, {43196, 43404}, {43397, 43643}, {43398, 43638}, {43434, Z83537}, {43435, Z83538}, {43479, 54581}, {43480, 54580}, {44134, Z65600}, {48884, 54174}, {48904, 51028}, {48942, 50967}, {48943, 54132}, {50866, 53620}, {51068, Y13393}, {51119, Y13452}, {Z20678, Z52787}, {Z38669, Z48482}, {Z43354, Z62960}, {Z48492, Z69121}

Y(13540) = intersection, other than A, B, C, of circumconics {{A, B, C, X(14093), X(16251)}}, {{A, B, C, X(15691), Z(27543)}}, {{A, B, C, X(41982), Z(27544)}}

Y(13540) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3523, 15640}

Y(13540) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these {i,j}: {10248, 50874}, {11001, 3526}, {15700, 15687}, {3090, 3830}, {5056, 6848}, {51068, Y13393}

Y(13540) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): {2, 15688, 15717}, {4, 10109, 3839}, {4, 15683, 17678}, {30, 15687, 15700}, {30, 3526, 11001}, {30, 3830, 3090}, {30, 6848, 5056}, {381, 11812, 5071}, {381, 15681, 17504}, {381, 3543, 17578}, {382, 15684, 15687}, {547, 15687, 14269}, {548, 12102, 3858}, {548, 3090, 3523}, {550, 3832, 17571}, {3090, 3528, 15720}, {3146, 3543, 15683}, {3523, 15640, 30}, {3523, 3832, 15022}, {3529, 5067, 550}, {3543, 15640, 381}, {3543, 15692, 3830}, {3830, 11539, 4}, {3857, 5154, 17563}, {5051, 17549, 2478}, {5072, 15694, 547}, {6886, 15697, 12100}, {6982, 15719, 15708}, {11737, 15692, 2}

Y(13540) = Orthology center of { (1-t)*A+t*G, ...} and ABC for t=-13/7
